response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise poured into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business in ways that only top-tier solutions can. Considering its unparalleled quality and benefits, we're extending an exclusive offer to you for this remarkable product at $14,000. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.", "product_price": 14000}
